info.name: Dark Gmailification for o2.pl mail
info.description:
For Polish users of o2 mail. Based on the Gmail Dark theme. Created for personal purposes, but thought about sharing. Not a complete dark mode conversion, settings remain white, attachments as for now are a bit broken, and jump to date is a little ugly. The CSS contains a few residue obfuscated classes from testing, need to clean them up. Updates will come. 

Obviously it's all very very very hacky. 

Naturally, the composer and mail view still have a white background due to the fact that it would be unnatural to display e-mail contents designed to have black text on a dark background. It's a philosophical issue more than anything, but I will be working on it. Maybe as an alternative in style settings.
info.additionalInfo:
Product Sans typeface is owned by Google LLC.

Style is not global, but the validation gets confused. Tested on Chrome 112. Tested with adblock enabled.

0.2.5 - black screen fix and some minor fixes. At one point, o2 added more aggressive ads which can only be blocked by using the :has() pseudo-class and probing the immediate sibling `div:has(+ #id)` which is a syntax unsupported by userstyles.org. So it's commented out. 
0.2.4 - added scrollbar to sidebar
0.2.3 - fixes for broken search and sidebar (change of markup). Updates for WP 1Login. Works fine without 1Login. 
0.2.2 - fixed background and sidebar
0.2.1 - added pointer-events: none for tabs scrim gradient.
